item.title: Multiple items in theiving
item.dc:creator: @wouterscape wouterscape
item.description:
@wouterscape wrote:

so u want som times tyo give 1 gp and some time to give silver

u need to make a random then i search it up for u

EDIT got it

open item.java and add

public static int silvers[] = {ADD HERE THE STUFF U WANT TO GET};

    public static int randomSilver()
    {
    	return silvers[(int)(Math.random()*silvers.length)];
    }

open up client.java
and search for gem stall under add

sendMessage("You sucessfully stole some silver!");
         addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[17]), 17);
         addItem(Item.silvers(), 1);
                        actionTimer = 5;
                        pEmote = 0x340;
                         updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                          }
                          else if(actionTimer >= 1)
                          {
                               sendMessage("You have to wait until you can steal another gem.");
                          }
                }
             }

and ur done ;D
